name: Chunky Pesto
description: This classic chunky pesto recipe is a vibrant and flavorful condiment perfect for pasta, grilled meats, or as a spread on bread. Made with fresh basil, garlic, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, and extra virgin olive oil, this pesto is easy to make and tastes incredible.

recipeInstructions.name: Whizz nuts
recipeInstructions.text: Whizz all the nuts in the blender into a chunky mix.

recipeInstructions.name: Whizz others
recipeInstructions.text: Whizz the garlic and basil separately.

recipeInstructions.name: Whizz mix
recipeInstructions.text: Whizz everything together slowly adding the olive oil until you reach the desired consistency.

notes: Can be easily stored frozen to keep it as fresh as possible. Just make into tablespoon sized balls and leave on a tray in the freezer. Once frozen, just scoop the balls into a plastic bag or container for easy access and put back into the freezer.
